title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Fry the pancetta and garlic until crispy. 3. Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan. 4. Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture. 5. Serve hot with extra Parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour. 2. Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked. 3. Cook onions until soft, then add tomatoes and cream. 4. Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer. 5. Garnish with coriander and serve.
